original_title: Russian Institute: Lesson 12 - Back to School
overview: It's already the beginning of term at the Russian Institute. For Sabrina, beginning are tough, especially when her friends want to offer her a workman as a welcome gift. Poor Sabrina, all this sensuality disturbs her, she dreams about orgies and double penetrations. A premonitory dream? Taking her destiny in hand, she will quickly offer herself to everyone, while teachers and elder pupils take back their lecherous habits. Spankings for dunces, very special physical education courses, without forgetting the pleasure between pupils thanks to dildos and lickings! An excellent beginning to the term announcing another great year.
title: Russian Institute: Lesson 12 - Back to School
